name: Lee Remick's Barbecued Chinese Duck
keywords: brown sugar, duck breast, sherry, dairy-free, fall, spring, summer, winter, main course

recipeInstructions.text: Trim excess fat and skin from the duck breasts. Combine the sherry, sugar, soy sauce, ginger and mustard and pour over the duck. Marinate several hours or overnight, turning occasionally.
Drain the duck and reserve the marinade. Grill for 20 to 25 minutes over medium heat, turning and moving duck to avoid flare-ups while basting frequently.
Allow the duck to rest for 5 minutes before slicing. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.
